name: BuffaLovesTrivia
0:
”Alexa, play Buffa Loves Trivia”
”start a new game”
”start game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buffa loves trivia
des:
Welcome to the premier trivia game about the great city of Buffalo, NY.

Whether Buffalo is your hometown or just your current tourist destination, play the Buffaloves Trivia game to quiz yourself about all things Buffalo. The city is more than just the home of the chicken wing, it has a long and storied history going back over 200 years. It has been the birthplace, and deathplace, of US presidents, the host of a World's Fair, and is a major gateway into the United States.

No matter if you call it The Queen City, The City of Good Neighbors, The Nickel City, The Queen City of the Lakes, or The City of Light, we all know it as our Buffalo.

Test your knowledge about the great city of Buffalo, NY today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
